title: ariyAda mukham
sahitya:
ariyAda mukhama kANa Ashai koNDEn pArttariyAda mukham kANa Ashai koNDEn


anupallavi

  teriyAda bAlanAi tAi mukham pArttu shirittiDum sHei enavE shiriyEnum kaN


caraNam    niraindiruppAi eninum urukkATTAi (ennuL) kaNam marandiDinum ennai marakkavoTTAi shirandoru
 tAyinum paridenaik-kAppAi marai pugazh nin guNam kETTu magizhndu mAdhavan un ezhil mEni ninaikkum nAn
